amendment.description: To require a report on reporting requirements applicable to the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4295 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4295 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S5995-6004; text: CR S5996) To require a report on reporting requirements applicable to the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4295 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Sessions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4295 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
